entry.title: Fingers Crossed
entry.summary:
Author: UnknownXFuture

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 436,492Chapters: 38/40Kudos: 1,050

Summary: “Have you ever heard of the butterfly effect?” Stiles looked up and shook his head. “No… what is it?” “It’s the idea that the smallest of situations, can set the biggest consequences in motion. A butterfly flapping it’s wings on one side of the world, creates a hurricane on the other.” He nodded, that’s exactly how this situation sounds right now. If he and Scott never went out that fateful night and looked for that body, or if he and Derek never became friends, or hell, if he never agreed to Deatons plan in the first place… then none of this would be happening. But fuck it, ‘caution’ isn’t in his vocabulary. ~~~ Updates every Monday <3

entry.title: I Drank Too Much Coffee and Accidentally Wrote Gay Werewolves Again
entry.summary:
Author: RiddlesSin

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 737Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 4

Summary: Beacon Hills is a town where the WiFi is bad, the trauma is permanent, and everyone is a little bit gay if you squint hard enough.Welcome to a Teen Wolf BxB One-Shot Collection featuring:emotionally constipated werewolves,boys who fall in love during near-death experiences,accidental confessions,locker room tension,soulmate nonsense,and at least one character saying “this is a bad idea” right before doing it anyway.Each one-shot is standalone, wildly unhinged, and written with the same energy as someone who grew up on Wattpad in 2011, survived Tumblr discourse, and now copes by making fictional men kiss.Read in order. Read out of order. Read at 2AM when you should be sleeping.I’m not your mom. (Unless Melissa McCall adopts you.)

entry.title: Wanna Talk About It?
entry.summary:
Author: mosquitoez

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,648Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 15

Summary: Derek couldn't talk about the fire. Even just thinking about it made him feel like his skin was getting peeled off. He buried his head into his knees, squeezing his eyes shut. He felt sick. Someone sat down beside him. He assumed it was Laura, or maybe a deputy coming out to bring him inside. It was possible he had been out here for a while. When he lifted his head, he was making eye contact with a child. "Um." Derek said, lowering his feet back to the ground. "Who are you." "I'm Mischief."

entry.title: Yellow Paper Daisy
entry.summary:
Author: Babysterek

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,180Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 46

Summary: “Well,” Peter says at last, forcing a crooked smile into his voice, “at least this time he didn’t almost get us all killed.”Derek swallows. His throat is dry, the words scraping on the way out. “I was drunk.” They land and disappear without effect. Talia turns then, her gaze settling on him fully. It’s steady, unreadable, and it makes his shoulders tense despite himself. “You were careless,” she says. Not angry. Not loud. Certain. “You are a werewolf, and if you got drunk, you laced it with wolfsbane, you did it. Do you understand, In twenty-four years, every scandal has had the same root. You. At some point, it stops being bad luck and becomes character. And I am tired of pretending this is something that merely happens to you.” Derek nods once, reflexive. “When you speak,” Talia continues, “you do so as a Hale. As Alpha blood. Your indulgences do not absolve you of that.” ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Derek just wanted a moment of quiet. Instead, he crosses a line with the last person he should trust.....old grudges, bad decisions, and a mistake he keeps repeating.

entry.title: Rake
entry.summary:
Author: Vampire_Finch

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,817Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 82

Summary: Au Regency Romance 1820 England. Explicit M/M sex scenes. Viscount Derek Hale has a notorious reputation as a dallier, a trifler, a breaker of Omega hearts and tarnisher of reputatiions, yet devishly handsome, charming and good -natured he is adored by London society. He is the type of aristocratic Alpha young Omega dabeutantes are warned to avoid at all costs. Stiles Stilinski is the 16 year old Omega son of Baron Noah Stilinski and his wife, Claudia. Taken to London for his debut into The Season and make a 'perfect match', Stiles is strenuously warned against any association with Viscount Hale by his cousin and Mother. Accepted into The Ton, Stiles inevitably meets Viscount Hale and more than sparks fly. Can Stiles preserve his and his family's reputation and tame a wild heart or become another notch on the Viscount's bedpost?

entry.title: Sparks Fly
entry.summary:
Author: lloyd_slander

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 68,290Chapters: 8/10Kudos: 1,049

Summary: "The possession freed your Spark. All you need to know for now is that you can give any creature unlimited power by being mated to them. Making you target number one in the supernatural world. Welcome to the chessboard, little red.", Stiles couldn't be a Spark. He was just Stiles, the boy who ran with the wolves. There was no way there was anything special about him. And what on heavens earth did the creeper uncle mean by being mated? And why was Derek growling like that?orThe Nogitsune was gone, and Stiles should have been able to live his perfectly normal human life, right? Wrong. Instead, he has to figure out what it means to be the most desired magical being in the supernatural world and be hunted down for his abilities. He was sure his life couldn’t get weirder. And then there was Derek who suddenly seemed very persistent on protecting him and growling at everything and everyone who came near him. Turns out it could get weirder.

entry.title: I'm Gonna Show You Crazy
entry.summary:
Author: evvie_99

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,039Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 194

Summary: He tried to warn Scott and the others but they all thought he was just being paranoid. But then Scott went and welcomed him with open arms. Now everyone he came to care about was in danger and the True idiot had no idea. The worst part of it all, is that Theo was right. There was a part of him that enjoyed the feeling of fear that poured off of everyone around him when he was possessed. The way even the wolves would cower away and silently beg for their lives as the Oni tore through everything and everyone at his command. It was a hunger from deep inside that was begging to be satiated. Unfortunately for him, he was too similar to the dark fox. And that need would never be filled, he’d be just as insatiable and just as destructive as the Nogitsune. Which is why he didn’t bother denying the truth that spilled from Theo’s mouth.

entry.title: AS IF WE NEVER EXISTED
entry.summary:
Author: evvie_99

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,463Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 60

Summary: They stood facing each other in the middle of the woods. Derek pursed his lips before coming to a decision.“Alright. But I do have one condition, if you want me to change you myself.”Stiles looked slightly hesitant but nodded. “Anything.”The corners of Derek’s mouth twitch slightly. “And then forever.”“That’s what I’m asking.” Stiles whispered.Derek stared at him for a few more seconds before responding again.“Marry me, Stiles.”Stiles let out a startled gasp. Of all the things Derek could have possibly wanted, this wasn’t what Stiles had imagined.

entry.title: Growing Pains
entry.summary:
Author: Sterektrashbag (vannybees)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,479Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 172

Summary: When virgins start dying in town Stiles is instantly terrified. Not only because he’s a virgin himself but also because somehow any time something bad is happening in town these days, it always ends up involving him and/or the pack in some way. So he thinks he’s more than allowed to be terrified about the whole thing.He bombards Derek with texts about it. Asking for updates and if they should have another pack meeting to go over things again. Derek already held an emergency pack meeting about the situation. They’re all monitoring it best they can but it doesn’t change the fact that Stiles is still a human virgin who is definitely going to end up dead. The Alpha reassures him with platitudes so Stiles ends up having to spell it out for him plain and simple. “I need to get fucked, Derek”. He immediately regrets texting that but he’s kind of panicking over here. Derek’s eventual reply makes his panic momentarily evaporate: “You’re right.”
